ChangeLog

All notable changes are documented in this file using the Keep a CHANGELOG principles.

4.0.4 - 2020-10-26

Fixed

  • SebastianBergmann\RecursionContext\Exception now correctly extends \Throwable

4.0.3 - 2020-09-28

Changed

  • #21: Add type annotations for in/out parameters
  • Changed PHP version constraint in composer.json from ^7.3 || ^8.0 to >=7.3

4.0.2 - 2020-06-26

Added

  • This component is now supported on PHP 8

4.0.1 - 2020-06-15

Changed

  • Tests etc. are now ignored for archive exports
